Layer.Name: Sales Comparables

LayerChart.DisplayName: Consideration by Year per Square Foot
Consideration by Landref per Square Foot

DataLink.Command: SELECT [OWNER_NAME] As [OWNER NAME] ,[BLOCK] ,[PARCEL] ,[NAME] ,[OWNERSHIP_TYPE] As [OWNERSHIP TYPE] ,[PROPRIETORSHIP_TYPE] As [PROPRIETORSHIP TYPE] ,[OWNER_ADDRESS] As [POSTAL ADDRESS] ,[STATUS] As [PARCEL STATUS] FROM LandBaseWeb.[webGIS].[PARCEL_OWNERS_HISTORY] WHERE BLOCK = @BLOCK And PARCEL = @PARCEL

SELECT ([BLOCK] + ' ' + [PARCEL] + ', ' + [REGISTERED_AREA]) As LABEL ,BLOCK ,PARCEL ,INSTRUMENT_NUMBER As INSTRUMENT ,PARCEL_NAME As [PARCEL NAME] ,[REGISTERED_AREA] As [PARCEL AREA] ,[STATUS] As [PARCEL STATUS] ,[REGISTRATION_SECTION] As [REGISTRATION SECTION] ,DISTRICT FROM [LandBaseWeb].[webGIS].[PARCEL_COMPS_FORMAT_HISTORY] Where instrument_number = @INSTRUMENT And NUM_VALUED_PARCELS > 1
SELECT CONSIDERATION, VALUATION_DATE PARCELREFID FROM [LandBaseWeb].[webGIS].[PARCEL_COMPARABLES] Where PARCELREFID = @PARCELREFID

Layer.FeatureDescription:

{AVG_RENT_STR}
CONSIDERATION (CI)
{CONSIDERATION_STR}

Layer.Name: Sales Map Tips

DataLink.Command: SELECT [OWNER_NAME] As [OWNER NAME] ,[BLOCK] ,[PARCEL] ,[NAME] ,[OWNERSHIP_TYPE] As [OWNERSHIP TYPE] ,[PROPRIETORSHIP_TYPE] As [PROPRIETORSHIP TYPE] ,[OWNER_ADDRESS] As [POSTAL ADDRESS] ,[STATUS] As [PARCEL STATUS] FROM LandBaseWeb.[webGIS].[PARCEL_OWNERS_HISTORY] WHERE BLOCK = @BLOCK And PARCEL = @PARCEL

SELECT ([BLOCK] + ' ' + [PARCEL] + ', ' + [REGISTERED_AREA]) As LABEL ,BLOCK ,PARCEL ,INSTRUMENT_NUMBER As INSTRUMENT ,PARCEL_NAME As [PARCEL NAME] ,[REGISTERED_AREA] As [PARCEL AREA] ,[STATUS] As [PARCEL STATUS] ,[REGISTRATION_SECTION] As [REGISTRATION SECTION] ,DISTRICT FROM [LandBaseWeb].[webGIS].[PARCEL_COMPS_FORMAT_HISTORY] Where instrument_number = @INSTRUMENT And NUM_VALUED_PARCELS > 1
